traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The centaur is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following Druid spells prepared: * Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, thornwhip * 1st level (4 slots): animal friendship, faerie fire, healing word * 2nd level (2 slots): barkskin, moonbeam

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The centaur makes two attacks: one with its quarterstaff and one with its hooves or two with its longbow.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.
